snippet: Avella High School in southwest Pennsylvania, which hasn’t had a playoff berth since 1976, has stirred an upwelling of pride in the community after starting the season 5-0.
abstract: Avella High School in southwest Pennsylvania, which has not had a playoff berth since 1976, has stirred an upwelling of pride in the community after starting the season 5-0; coach Ryan Cecchini has repaved the culture, requiring off-season workouts, including a new weight-lifting program and film study.
lead_paragraph: Avella High School in southwest Pennsylvania, which hasn’t had a playoff berth since 1976, has stirred an upwelling of pride in the community after starting the season 5-0.

headline.seo: Avella High School in Pennsylvania Regains Football Pride
headline.main: Rebuilding Program, and Pride of a Town
headline.print_headline: Pennsylvania High School Rebuilds Program, and the Pride of a Town
